info.title: Crypto Investor API
info.description: API for fetching cryptocurrency price, market and news information.

get.description: Returns a list of all supported currencies. Always use the id's gathered here to lookup data for specific currencies.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: timeframe to return the sparkline data for

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: currency id to return sparkline data for

parameters.name: start-time
parameters.description: Start time of the interval in RFC3339 (URI escaped)

parameters.name: end-time
parameters.description: End time of the interval in RFC3339 (URI escaped). If not provided, the current time is used.

get.description: Get historic price of a currency for the specified timeframe and currency

prices.description: array of prices in default: USD

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of currencies IDs to filter result

parameters.name: convert
parameters.description: Currency to quote ticker price, market cap, and volume values. May be a Fiat Currency or Cryptocurrency. Default is USD

get.description: Price and volume information for one or more currencies
Returns the latest global cryptocurrency market metrics. Use the "convert" option to return market values in multiple fiat and cryptocurrency conversions in the same call.

parameters.name: convert
parameters.description: The currency to convert the default USD values to. Must be a Fiat currency. Use the /conversion-rates endpoint to check which currencies are available

value.name: Binance
value.description: Binance is a global cryptocurrency exchange that provides a platform for trading more than 100 cryptocurrencies. Since early 2018, Binance is considered as the biggest cryptocurrency exchange in the world in terms of trading volume

get.description: Get a list of supported exchnages

parameters.name: convert
parameters.description: Currency to convert the volume to. Check the /conversion-rates endpoint to check the available currencies to convert to.

value.message: At #Crypto Center we are looking for franchisees with an entrepreneurial & managerial spirit, a strong sense of interpersonal skills. #Franchisees who know how to train & motivate their employees, driven by passion.In-depth :play_button: https://t.co/4H6I2jh1tx#Peculium #invest #success https://t.co/4ykvMnydEj
value.title: OKEx BTCUSD Options Registers Trading Volume of USD175.6M Volume in its Very First Month

The recently launched BTCUSD options trading feature on the platform is reported to have garnered volumes of around $176 million within a span of one month. The figures...

get.description: Return a list of twitter messsages

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: region for which to return twitter messages from

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Currency ids to limit the results to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of twitter message to return

get.description: Return a list of the available categories for news and social items.
Return a list of tags which can be used.

value.title: OKEx BTCUSD Options Registers Trading Volume of USD175.6M Volume in its Very First Month
value.excerpt: The leading cryptocurrency and digital asset trading platform OKEx is having a great run as it continues to provide world-class trading products for the global crypto community. The recently launched BTCUSD options trading feature on the platform is reported to have garnered volumes of around $176 million within a span of one month. The figures...

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: region or commaseperated list of regions to limit the results to

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: list of currencies to limit results for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of news items to return

get.description: Return a list of the latest news items, limit to currencties, region or amount of news items.
Return a list of news sources.

currencies.description: list of projects the newsitems related to

title.example: This Bitcoin Metric Is Over 100% Higher in 2 Months, and It’s Critical for Bulls

excerpt.example: Over the past 60 days, Bitcoin has found itself rocketing higher, rallying from a low of $6,400 to a local top of $10,500 in the span of two months.

full_article.description: text of the full article if available
full_article.example: Over the past few years, as institutional traders and more serious players have entered the Bitcoin market, the demand for future derivatives for the cryptocurrency has exploded.  This was confirmed with a report from industry outlet The Block.  They reported that as of February 13th, the aggregated amount of open interest on Bitcoin futures contracts surpassed $5 billion, with traders on BitMEX, OKEx, Bakkt, CME, and other key platforms throwing billions of dollars at the asset.  This is far above the approximately $4 billion in open interest seen in January of the $2.5 billion in December.

expert_level.description: Audience expert level for which the newsitem is best suited

example.message: At #Crypto Center we are looking for franchisees with an entrepreneurial & managerial spirit, a strong sense of interpersonal skills. #Franchisees who know how to train & motivate their employees, driven by passion.In-depth :play_button: https://t.co/4H6I2jh1tx#Peculium #invest #success https://t.co/4ykvMnydEj

The recently launched BTCUSD options trading feature on the platform is reported to have garnered volumes of around $176 million within a span of one month. The figures...

message.example: Crypto is very busy and many people just don’t have any time to learn about projects. Many are skeptical.Ravencoin has a different structure than most projects in that no one owns or controls it. This means the only way to hear about it is from other users.

expert_level.description: Audience expert level for the tweet content

twitterSource.description: Returns all twitter sources crypto investor stream uses

username.description: twiter username of the twitters source

bio.example: Binance is the biggest exchange in the altcoin space

image-url.description: link to the logo url for the project

bio_short.example: Ethereum is an open source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract functionality.

bio_long.example: Ethereum is an open source, public, blockchain-based distributed computing platform and operating system featuring smart contract functionality. It supports a modified version of Nakamoto consensus via transaction-based state transitions

platform.description: Platform the project is built on

platform-token-address.description: Address of the project on the platform it is build on.

value_classification.description: Classification for the fear and greed value

example.name: Binance
example.description: Binance is a global cryptocurrency exchange that provides a platform for trading more than 100 cryptocurrencies. Since early 2018, Binance is considered as the biggest cryptocurrency exchange in the world in terms of trading volume

region.description: Region in which the exchange operates

country.description: Country where the exchange is located

last_update.description: Time of the last update of the exchange information

blog.description: Link to the blog of the exchange

twitter.description: Link to the twitter account for the exchange

telegram.description: Limk to the telegram channel for the exchange

fees.description: Link to the fees page of the exchange

website.description: Link to the website of the exchange

rank.description: Rank of the exchange based on adjusted volume

quote_currency.description: Quote currency for the volume information. Use the convert query parameter to convert to a different currency

fcas.title: fcas
fcas.description: FCAS ratings for all available currencies

total_volume_24h.description: Total 24 hour volume in quote currency

altcoin_marketcap.description: Total altcoin marketcap in quoted volume

last_update.description: Last update of the market information

currency-metadata.title: currency-metadata
currency-metadata.description: Returns the metadata for a list of specific currency

example.bio_long: Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency. It is a decentralized digital currency

logo_url.description: Link to the logo of the currency

bio_short.example: Bitcoin (BTC) is a consensus network that enables a new payment system and a completely digital currency.

bio_long.example: Bitcoin (BTC) is a consensus network that enables a new payment system and a completely digital currency. Powered by its users, it is a peer to peer payment network that requires no central authority to operate. On October 31st, 2008, an individual or group of individuals operating under the pseudonym "Satoshi Nakamoto" published the Bitcoin Whitepaper and described it as: "a purely peer-to-peer version of electronic cash, which would allow online payments to be sent directly from one party to another without going through a financial institution."

hq_location.description: Headquater location of the development team

vertical_types.description: Vertical types which the currency belongs to

links.title: links
links.description: Returns links related to the currency

communities.title: communities
communities.description: Return the communities related to the currency
